meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hideous.
meanings.sent1: The hideousness of the monster scared the children.
meanings.sent2: The hideousness of the painting made me look away.
meanings.sent3: The hideousness of the clown's outfit made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The hideousness of the situation was like a dark cloud over us.
meanings.sent5: The hideousness of the crime scene was etched in my memory.

meanings.definition: Something that is extremely unpleasant to look at.
meanings.sent1: The movie's hideousness made me cover my eyes.
meanings.sent2: The hideousness of the old building made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The hideousness of the cake's decoration was unintentional.
meanings.sent4: The hideousness of the graffiti on the wall was a shock.
meanings.sent5: The hideousness of the fashion trend was hard to ignore.
